message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 60% and you take 40%
I'll take 80% and leave you with 20%, Alice. It's a good deal!
I'll give you a bit more this time, Bob. But don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, Alice. Take 30% and leave me with 70%
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. 50/50 split. No more games.
